text:
Thanggam LRT Station is an LRT station in Sengkang, Singapore. It is part of the Sengkang LRT Line. It opened together with the rest of the west loop on January 2005. At the same time, the Punggol LRT Line's east loop opened. It is near Jalan Kayu.
Name.
"Thanggam" is the Tamil word for gold. There is a road called Lorong Thanggam near it.
